coding with passion.heading: Coding with passion
coding with passion.p1: My coding adventure began when I turned 15.
coding with passion.p2: Since then, I've been spending most of my free time developing and perfecting my skills in that field.
coding with passion.p3: Quality of my code isn't indifferent to me - I always try to look for solutions, that will make my code readable and effective.

experience with design.heading: Experience in graphic design
experience with design.p1: Before I started programming, I was focused on graphic design.
experience with design.p2: The skills and experience I've aquired back then, help me with animations and user interfaces up to this day.

backend.C#: solid understanding of the language - advanced async, SOLID principles, design patterns;
backend.NET: familarity with the runtime environment, especially .NET Core;

frontend.JavaScript: ECMAScript 6+, basics of TypeScript, basic knowledge of JS ecosystem;
frontend.Vuejs: Vue CLI, transitions, filters, async components, Vuex store;
frontend.axios: basic REST API requests; request middleware;

design.Photoshop: image correction and manipulation; layers, masks, adjustments etc.;
design.Illustrator: shape building; logo design; exporting to SVG format;
design.PremierePro: video editing, syncing, montage; basic color correction;
design.figmaadobexd: basic design and prototyping for UI/UX.

skills-list.english: fluent, allowing communication and reading (or creating) technical documentation;
skills-list.abstract: problem solving, splitting them into smaller ones;

experience.FollowUP: social media automation - creating and maintaining server software responsible for user interaction and Instagram profiles automation (ASP.Net Core); creating client's dashboard for managing the services (Vue.js); managing MSSQL database; visual identification; creation of the landing page with services' description.

backend.CSharp: solid understanding of the language - delegates (with lambdas, Action and Func), generics, reflection, advanced async etc.; SOLID principles; design patterns - Factory, Template Method, Repository, Singleton, Observer etc.
backend.ASPNET Core: creating WebAPI using MVC pattern, authentication and authorization using  JSON Web Tokens; background services; EntityFramework Core + MSSQL
backend.NET: familarity with the runtime environment, especially .NET Core, knowledge of its frameworks and platforms
backend.autofac: basics of Dependency Injection; registering and resolving services; lifetime scopes

frontend.JavaScript: ECMAScript 6+; Array functions; Promises, async/await, local storage; basics of TypeScript - types, interfaces, generics; basic understanding of JavaScript ecosystem (Webpack, Babel, ESLint); knowledge of event propagation and event loop
frontend.Reactjs: create-react-app; JSX; functional and class components; Higher Order Components; Render Props; Context; Hooks
frontend.Vuejs: Vue CLI; transitions; filters; async components; Vuex store
frontend.axios: basic REST API requests; request middleware

design.Photoshop: image correction and manipulation; layers, masks, adjustments etc.
design.Illustrator: shape building; logo design; exporting to SVG format
design.Premiere Pro: video editing, syncing, montage; basic color correction
design.figmaadobexd: basic design and prototyping for UI/UX

about.question: Few words about me?
about.answer: Take a hip-hop-ish, street-like style and give it a tie. Mix emotional composure with a big dose of smile. Add love of nature and a little bit of perfectionism. Put it before computer screen and surround it with dozens of plants - at this moment you should see something that looks pretty similar :)
